item.title: Why this page exists
item.description: For the last few years, my hobby is astronomy. During that time I had to figure out many details in the area of optics, photography, equipment and to some degree physics. What is a difference between MAK and SCT, what kind of eyepiece should I buy, what camera is the best for me and still in the budget and how to connect all these pieces, etc. So far I haven't found a place where all this information is together in the form and detail I expect.

item.title: Why 2.71
item.description: It's a tribute to one of the greatest mathematicians.

item.title: My equipment
item.description: Here is my current equipment: Skywatcher Maksutov-Newtonian 190mm f/5.3, upgraded with Baader Diamond Steeltrack focuser EQ6-R Celestron Luminos 7mm, 15mm, 23mm Celestron Luminos 2.5x barlow lens Main camera: ZWO ASI1600mm Pro Guider/planetary camera: ZWO ASI290mc ZWO OAG, ZWO EFWmini filter wheel, ZWO LRGB 31mm filters DIY robofocuser (article to be written) DIY Li-ion 320Wh battery pack (article to be written) Intel NUC with Archlinux/Indi/KStars/Ekos software to control the equipment What I used in the past:
